snippet: The defendant, Saeed Talebi, 40, has been charged with trying to ship American industrial goods to Iran for use by petrochemical companies there.
lead_paragraph: The defendant, Saeed Talebi, 40, has been charged with trying to ship American industrial goods to Iran for use by petrochemical companies there.

headline.main: U.S. Charges Iranian With Conspiring to Violate Sanctions
headline.print_headline: U.S. Charges Iranian With Conspiring to Violate Sanctions
